name: agile_agi_functionality
description: A combined function representing the inherent capacities of AGI to learn, adapt, make decisions, and maintain ethical alignment.

experience_learning.description: Indicates if AGI can learn from past experiences.

flexibility.description: Indicates if AGI can adapt to new challenges and environments.

generalization.description: Indicates if AGI can apply learned knowledge to unseen situations.

goal_directed_behavior.description: Indicates if AGI can set and pursue its own goals.

problem_solving.description: Indicates if AGI can engage in complex planning and select optimal actions.

task_autonomy.description: Indicates if AGI can execute tasks autonomously and learn from the outcomes.

value_alignment.description: Indicates if AGI is aligned with human values and ethics.

self_awareness.description: Indicates if AGI understands its own goals and reasoning.

transparency.description: Indicates if AGI can explain its decision-making processes.
